item.title: Gamma 40 Hertz
item.description: iOS Self Improvement My Most Healthful App The Gamma 40 Hertz app gives you access to a quick brain boost. Some recent research suggests that 40 hertz gamma brain waves decline with age and that reversing the decline can be helpful. This app stimulates 40 hertz gamma waves through light, sound, and touch. Features: Multimodal, individually adjustable intensity across sound, touch, and sight 40 hertz square wave audio tone 40 hertz haptic vibration 40 hertz visual signal using your deviceâ€™s flash Now available on the App Store!
